708.quoteText:
The user is obliged

(a) to provide only true and non-misleading statements along with its real name, and to refrain from using pseudonyms or pen names,
708.title: No pseudonym allowed

tosdr.case: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
tosdr.tldr: You must use your legal name publicly on the service. Using a pseudonym or a pen name is not allowed. This can have negative consequences on the freedom of expression, especially for people who exercise certain professions, or who live in certain countries.

1019.quoteText:
The user is obliged

(a) to provide only true and non-misleading statements along with its real name, and to refrain from using pseudonyms or pen names,
1019.title: pseudonym not allowed (user-to-user trust is relevant for service)

tosdr.case: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
tosdr.tldr: You must use your real name. Using a pseudonym is not allowed.
